reviewText:
Don't bother buying this product the reception stinks. If you looking for a crisp clean picture do not order this product. I have ben a
Lucy fan all my life but I was very disappointed with this product. Good Lucy people and happy Lucy watching
,

Lucy Ball is the best drug against grumpyness I know.  If you are the first buyer, and seldom lough, and live in a building with thin walls.  Warn your neighbours! They might think your screams came from pain. I have been a Lucy fan from the start. This product (I bought many) is a collection galore with  Lucy at her best.
Dear Lucy! You have an agent in Iceland! Me.
